trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will display an ActiveX control's About dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 表示将显示 ActiveX 控件的“关于”对话框的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.AboutBoxDelegate> provides you the ability to be notified when the ActiveX control's About box is going to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.AboutBoxDelegate>能够时 ActiveX 控件的有关框中将显示通知。

trans-unit.source: Code added to the delegate method is executed before the About box is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 在显示关于框之前，将执行代码添加到委托方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.AboutBoxDelegate> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the display of an ActiveX control's About dialog box if it has one.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.AboutBoxDelegate>委托时，需要标识将处理 ActiveX 控件的有关对话框中的显示，如果有的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the method with your handler, add an instance of the delegate to the method.
trans-unit.target: 若要将方法与您的处理程序关联，添加到方法的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The handler is called whenever the method is called, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，该处理程序会调用时调用该方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example overrides the constructor, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.SetAboutBoxDelegate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.AttachInterfaces%2A> methods of an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost> derived class that wraps the Microsoft Masked Edit ActiveX Control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例重写构造函数中，与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.SetAboutBoxDelegate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.AttachInterfaces%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost>派生包装 Microsoft 掩码编辑 ActiveX 控件的类。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes you have created the generated source code by running the AxImp.exe on the MSMask32.ocx file with the `/source` switch to generate the wrapper class to be edited.
trans-unit.target: 此代码假定已通过运行 AxImp.exe MSMask32.ocx 文件上创建所生成的源代码`/source`开关来生成要编辑的包装类。

trans-unit.source: This code is only shown in C# syntax as that is the only language output by the AxImp.exe.
trans-unit.target: 此代码将仅显示在 C# 语法中作为，它是唯一的语言输出通过 AxImp.exe。
